title: Train Fest Marathon
longDesc: Join us for a full day of train mania! Explore hidden lines, complete unique challenges, and earn exclusive Train Otaku badges.

title: Coaster Crazy Weekend
shortDesc: Ride the loops, compete for fastest times.
longDesc: Millennium Force time trials, special speed buffs, and double XP for Coaster Thoosies. Prizes for top 3 times!

title: Retro Console Showdown
shortDesc: Collect and battle with classic hardware.
longDesc: A special tournament for Console Collectors—use your vintage gear for unique power-ups. Exclusive museum passes up for grabs!

title: Artist Collab Jam
shortDesc: Team up with other artists to create giant murals.
longDesc: Share your creativity in a 48-hour art marathon. Vote for the best collaborative mural. Winners get a special in-game brush tool!

title: Hackathon 2077
shortDesc: Coders unite to push the game to its limits.
longDesc: Invent your own shortcuts, macros, or mini-scripts. Just don’t break the server again! Top 5 coders earn the 'Legendary Debugger' title.
